data.name: Guided Strikes
data.tooltip:
Calldown <d ref="duckiesHeroVulcanBombs_StartPersistent.periodic.count" style="Bold"/> explosive rounds to strike target area at random. Each round deals <d ref="duckiesHeroVulcanBombs_ImpactDamageRadius.amount" style="Bold"/> (+<d ref="duckiesHeroVulcanBombs_TagBonusStructure.bonus" style="Bold"/> vs structures) area damage.

Long initial delay.
